title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Peer Review Design and Operational Strategies in Scientific Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain characteristics by the five peer assessment clusters (purpose, procedure, criteria, feedback types, technological tools)
Learners design a three-tiered (basic-intermediate-advanced) assessment rubric applicable to scientific research reports

Learners create a 5-step guide for operating peer assessment processes in online LMS environments (e.g., Moodle, Blackboard) — including setting criteria, role distribution, feedback form design, scheduling, and result analysis — and achieve ≥80% satisfaction in feedback received from three peer learners
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
